value:
May I ask about your summoning
magic? You tie the skies together?
Is that wind magic like my own?

I studied in Khadein, the City of
Magic. It was a remarkable place,
with desert sand to the horizons...

Thank you for what you do. Your
guidance keeps everyone motivated
and safe.

I've known Prince Marth and his
sister Princess Elice for many
years. They are truly good people.

I've always been physically weak.
But I wanted to protect...people
precious to me, so I studied magic.

Let's see now... You must be
$Nu, right?$k$pI'm Merric—here with a hello
from $Nf!

It seems the Excalibur tome has
guided me well.

My body feels so light! I can move
like the wind itself!

It seems I haven't trained enough.
I will begin again with the basics.

I will use this new power to
protect those precious to me.

I am Merric, a mage from Altea.
What I learned of wind magic in
Khadein is at your disposal.

It's been some time since we began
to fight side by side, yet you still
find ways to surprise me.$k$pI don't mean that in a bad way!
You're just...a very mysterious
person.$k$pYou're not like anyone I've met.
The things you come up with...the
rest of us have never dreamed of.$k$pYou are like a wind that blows
through each of our lives and
changes our fates.$k$pSo please know that I believe in
you and your abilities. I will work
with you as long as you'll have me.
えいっ！
はぁっ！
うああっ！
Drat...
Winds, heed me!
Here it comes!
Now you've done it.
I will not fail!
Be safe...
Heehee
Is something the matter?
Er, could you perhaps find another way to get my attention?
Ah, what a pleasant breeze...
I've been reading the most fascinating tome!
If you don't mind, I would like to chat with you.
The magic I have learned must protect everyone.
I enjoy spending time with you. It puts me at ease.
Understood.
Hmm...
Indeed.
